practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Police Brutality|Police Misconduct|Civil Rights|Medical Malpractice
description:
Murphy Falcon Murphy is a personal injury and criminal defense law firm in Baltimore, Maryland. We are not just attorneys. We are trial lawyers with extensive knowledge and experience.

Strong leadership

Our senior partner and founding attorney, Judge William H. "Billy" Murphy, Jr., guides our law firm and champions our most complex cases. He embodies our commitment to community as the son of one of Baltimore's first African American judges. He also has a 90% success record in state court and over four times the national average rate of wins in federal cases.

Broad range of practice areas

We represent injured people in a wide variety of cases - and we have the resources necessary for success. Within the general category of personal injury, our practice areas include civil rights law; police brutality and misconduct; cases involving huge companies, such as class actions, toxic torts, pharmaceutical liability, product liability and consumer protection; medical malpractice, including nursing home malpractice, surgical errors, birth injuries and pharmacist errors; car and trucking accidents; assault and battery; construction accidents; animal bites; and wrongful death.

Our law firm also handles criminal defense, discrimination, defamation and privacy violations. Our experienced litigators are ready to take any and all of these issues to the highest levels, as well as to advance claims through the appeals system.

Accessible representation

At Murphy Falcon Murphy, we believe that injured people deserve a fair deal. Free consultations are available, and we accept credit cards.
